metadata.title: CVE-2016-3824 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: omx/OMXNodeInstance.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.xbefore 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before2016-08-01 does not validate the buffer port, which allows attackers togain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 28816827.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
